description: The New York Times Best Sellers are up-to-date and authoritative lists of the most popular books in the United States, based on sales in the past week, including fiction, non-fiction, paperbacks, children’s books, audiobooks, graphic books and more.
title: Paperback Nonfiction
title_page: Paperback Nonfiction Books - Best Sellers - Books - July 17, 2022
maintext:
21 weeks on the list
EDUCATED
by Tara Westover
Random House
The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
